name: The Jaunt
description:
"The Jaunt" this game is about a spaceship traveling to a distant planet to escape a war-torn Earth. During the voyage, the passengers encounter a dangerous ordeal - giant ships covered in tentacles.You as the brave captain must destroy all enemy ships and clear the way.

W button allows you to fly upwards 

S button allows you to fly down

A button allows you to fly left

D button allows to fly to the right 

holding down button A or D and pressing SHIFT will speed up the character

Shooting on the right mouse button
